testcase.classname: To validate New user sign up and send email functionality
testcase.name: New user sign-up
testcase.system-out: Given I should be in login page.............................................passed When I click on signup link.................................................passed And I enter First name as "Test"............................................passed And I enter Last name as "User61"...........................................passed And I enter email id as "a@a.com"...........................................passed And I enter username as "testing969"........................................passed And I enter password as "testing123"........................................passed And I enter confirmpass as "testing123".....................................passed And I click on Register button..............................................passed Then I should see the confirmation message:.................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate New user sign up and send email functionality
testcase.name: Send email after registration
testcase.system-out: Given User is successfully registered.......................................passed When I click on profile option..............................................passed And I click on inbox option.................................................passed And I click on compose button...............................................passed And I enter name as "User61"................................................passed And I enter subject as "Hi For Testing" in subject box......................passed And I enter body of the message:............................................passed And I click on send button..................................................passed Then I should see confirmation message as "The message has been sent to Test User61 (testing989)".passed
